20110124013632.000|20110124013633.000|CC1|>> Reporter: FOR MORE THAN TWO  
20110124013633.000|20110124013634.000|CC1|DECADES, THE WHITE FAMILY HAS   
20110124013634.000|20110124013634.000|CC1|SUFFERED.                       
20110124013634.000|20110124013635.000|CC1|THAT ALL CHANGED LAST WEEK WHEN 
20110124013635.000|20110124013636.000|CC1|POLICE SAY DNA CONFIRMED NEDRA'S
20110124013636.000|20110124013636.000|CC1|TRUE IDENTITY.                  
20110124013636.000|20110124013637.000|CC1|THE 23-YEAR-OLD HAD LONG        
20110124013637.000|20110124013637.000|CC1|SUSPECTED PETTWAY WASN'T HER    
20110124013637.000|20110124013638.000|CC1|REAL MOTHER.                    
20110124013638.000|20110124013639.000|CC1|SHE SEARCHED ONLINE AND FOUND A 
20110124013639.000|20110124013640.000|CC1|PHOTO OF A MISSING BABY THAT    
20110124013640.000|20110124013641.000|CC1|LOOKED FAMILIAR.                
20110124013641.000|20110124013642.000|CC1|IT WAS THE BIGGEST CLUE IN      
20110124013642.000|20110124013648.000|CC1|SOLVING THE MYSTERY OF HER LIFE.
20110124013648.000|20110124013649.000|CC1|PETTWAY IS EXPECTED TO APPEAR IN
20110124013649.000|20110124013650.000|CC1|MANHATTAN FEDERAL COURT TOMORROW

20110124013744.000|20110124013750.000|CC1|GOOD SIGN.                      
20110124013750.000|20110124013755.000|CC1|>> THERE'S A LITTLE FLUID       
20110124013755.000|20110124013756.000|CC1|COLLECTION THAT THE DOCS THERE  
20110124013756.000|20110124013756.000|CC1|PUT A DRAIN INTO AROUND HER

20110124013759.000|20110124013800.000|CC1|FLUID IS AN EXPECTED SIDE EFFECT

20110124013802.000|20110124013806.000|CC1|RECOVERS.                       
20110124013806.000|20110124013807.000|CC1|>> IT'S NOT UNCOMMON AT ALL TO

20110124013906.000|20110124013907.000|CC1|>> Reporter: GIVEN JARED        
20110124013907.000|20110124013908.000|CC1|LOUGHNER'S OBVIOUSLY TROUBLED

20110124013909.000|20110124013910.000|CC1|POLICE AT HIS COMMUNITY COLLEGE 
20110124013910.000|20110124013911.000|CC1|DESCRIBING THEIR MENTAL HEALTH

20110124013912.000|20110124013914.000|CC1|CERTAIN THAT HIS DEFENSE LAWYERS
20110124013914.000|20110124013915.000|CC1|WILL MAKE THAT AN ISSUE.

20110124013917.000|20110124013918.000|CC1|WHETHER HE'S MENTALLY COMPETENT 
20110124013918.000|20110124013920.000|CC1|TO STAND TRIAL.

20110124013921.000|20110124013923.000|CC1|WHETHER HE IS ABLE TO UNDERSTAND
20110124013923.000|20110124013925.000|CC1|THE MEANING OF WHAT'S GOING ON  
20110124013925.000|20110124013931.000|CC1|IN THE COURTROOM OR CAN PROPERLY
20110124013931.000|20110124013932.000|CC1|ASSIST IN HIS OWN DEFENSE.      
20110124013932.000|20110124013932.000|CC1|STEP TWO COULD BE TO OFFER A    
20110124013932.000|20110124013933.000|CC1|DEFENSE OF NOT GUILTY BY REASON 
20110124013933.000|20110124013934.000|CC1|OF INSANITY.                    
20110124013934.000|20110124013935.000|CC1|IT'S RAISED IN LESS THAN 1% OF  
20110124013935.000|20110124013936.000|CC1|ALL CRIMINAL CASES AND WHEN IT  
20110124013936.000|20110124013940.000|CC1|IS, JURIES ACCEPT IT ONLY ABOUT 
20110124013940.000|20110124013941.000|CC1|A QUARTER OF THE TIME.          
20110124013941.000|20110124013942.000|CC1|LEGAL EXPERTS SAY IT COULD BE   
20110124013942.000|20110124013943.000|CC1|ESPECIALLY DIFFICULT IN         
20110124013943.000|20110124013944.000|CC1|LOUGHNER'S CASE, GIVEN THE      
20110124013944.000|20110124013944.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT'S CLAIM THAT HE      
20110124013944.000|20110124013945.000|CC1|PLANNED THE SHOOTING WELL IN    
20110124013945.000|20110124013948.000|CC1|ADVANCE.                        
20110124013948.000|20110124013949.000|CC1|>> TO BE LEGALLY INSANE, THEY   
20110124013949.000|20110124013950.000|CC1|HAVE TO NOT BE ABLE TO CONTROL  
20110124013950.000|20110124013952.000|CC1|THEIR ACTIVITIES.

20110124013957.000|20110124013958.000|CC1|PREMEDITATION LIKE THEY APPEAR  
20110124013958.000|20110124014001.000|CC1|TO HERE.

20110124015929.000|20110124015933.000|CC1|THE GARBAGE.
